lead_paragraph: Leicester City manager Claudio Ranieri's primary objective this season was to avoid relegation after their narrow escape last year, he has said in an interview as his team stand seven points clear atop the Premier League.

headline.print_headline: Leicester's Ranieri Says Aim Was to Avoid Relegation
headline.main: Leicester's Ranieri Says Aim Was to Avoid Relegation

snippet: Leicester City manager Claudio Ranieri's primary objective this season was to avoid relegation after their narrow escape last year, he has said in an interview as his team stand seven points clear atop the Premier League....
